
.. _file_necsim_setup.cpp:

File setup.cpp
==============

|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Parent directory <dir_necsim>` (``necsim``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS


Contains the command line parsing and setup options for necsim.
